Uses of Class
it.polimi.ingsw.util.observers.ObservableGame

Packages that use ObservableGame 
Package Description
it.polimi.ingsw.core  
it.polimi.ingsw.network  
it.polimi.ingsw.util.observers  

  • Uses of ObservableGame in it.polimi.ingsw.core

    Subclasses of ObservableGame in it.polimi.ingsw.core 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Game
    This class is the main class for the model in the Distributed MVC pattern, this class is one of the few accessible classes of the core (the model) package, it expose some methods accessible from the outside classes which can be used to change the values of the game.

  • Uses of ObservableGame in it.polimi.ingsw.network

    Methods in it.polimi.ingsw.network with parameters of type ObservableGame 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void RemoteView.updateActivePlayer​(ObservableGame observed, java.lang.String playerName)
    This method sends the information about the active player turn and changes the network phase of the ServerClientListenerThread.
    void RemoteView.updateColors​(ObservableGame observed, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Color> playerColors)
    When this method is called it informs the player about the color chosen by the other players, if all players have chosen card it change the handler phase and says to the client that he enters in the god selection phase
    void RemoteView.updateDefeat​(ObservableGame observed, java.lang.String playerDefeated)
    This method sends the message of defeat to the player connected with this remote view.
    void RemoteView.updateGameFinished​(ObservableGame observed)
    This method sends the message to the client that the game is finished because someone has disconnected during the setup.
    void RemoteView.updateOrder​(ObservableGame observed, java.lang.String[] order)
    This method sends the message with the order of play.
    void RemoteView.updatePhaseChange​(ObservableGame observed, Turn turn)
    This method sends the information about the current game phase.
    void RemoteView.updatePositions​(ObservableGame observed, Map gameMap, boolean finished)
    This method sends a message to the client with the information about the updated map.
    void RemoteView.updatePossibleActions​(ObservableGame observed, java.util.List<Move> moves, java.util.List<Build> builds)
    This method sends the information about the possible action of the current player in this game phase.
    void RemoteView.updateWinner​(ObservableGame observed, java.lang.String playerWinner)
    This method sends the message of win to the player connected with this remote view.

  • Uses of ObservableGame in it.polimi.ingsw.util.observers

    Methods in it.polimi.ingsw.util.observers with parameters of type ObservableGame 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void ObserverRemoteView.updateActivePlayer​(ObservableGame observed, java.lang.String playerName)
    This method is called when game state changed because the turn changed and there is a new active player and the client must be notified.
    void ObserverRemoteView.updateColors​(ObservableGame observed, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Color> playerColors)
    This method is called when game state changed because a player has chosen a color and the player will be informed about the chosen colors.
    void ObserverRemoteView.updateDefeat​(ObservableGame observed, java.lang.String playerDefeated)
    This method is called when game state changed and a player has been defeated and this information will be sent to the client.
    void ObserverRemoteView.updateGameFinished​(ObservableGame observed)
    This method is called when game state changed because it is finished and the player will be notified.
    void ObserverRemoteView.updateOrder​(ObservableGame observed, java.lang.String[] order)
    This method is called when game state changed updating the gaming order, the player will be notified about the new order.
    void ObserverRemoteView.updatePhaseChange​(ObservableGame observed, Turn turn)
    This method is called when game state changed because it entered in a different phase and this information will be sent to the user.
    void ObserverRemoteView.updatePositions​(ObservableGame observed, Map gameMap, boolean finished)
    This method is called when game state changed because a player positioned its worker on the game table, the player will be informed.
    void ObserverRemoteView.updatePossibleActions​(ObservableGame observed, java.util.List<Move> moves, java.util.List<Build> builds)
    This method is called when game state changed and has calculated the possible action that the active player can perform, the player will be informed about them.
    void ObserverRemoteView.updateWinner​(ObservableGame observed, java.lang.String playerWinner)
    This method is called when game state changed because there is a winner and this information will be sent to the client.
